attributes.action: Make Help to Buy avaliable for 2nd time buyers again
attributes.additional_details: Opening the scheme back up to homeowners who would like to move from shared ownership to the equity help to buy scheme would be beneficial to some who are still struggling, especially as the rent for shared ownership properties can sometimes be extremely high and unaffordable.
attributes.background: Extend the help to buy scheme and revert back to the previous eligibility criteria. This would mean the scheme would be open to 2nd time buyers who wish to move and sell their existing property.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617647
